name: Arbok

attacks.name: Terror Strike
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads and if your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokémon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Poison Fang
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

flavorText: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.

strengths: Terror Strike can disrupt opponent's setup by forcing switches
Poison Fang guarantees Poison for damage over time
Low energy cost for Terror Strike
weaknesses: 60 HP is low for a Stage 1
Terror Strike's switch is opponent's choice
counters: High HP Pokemon unaffected by Poison

competitiveHistory: Arbok saw minimal competitive play due to its low HP and damage output. The forced switch mechanic on Terror Strike was interesting but giving the opponent the choice limited its usefulness.

rulings.ruling: Terror Strike's damage is applied before the switch occurs.
The opponent chooses which Benched Pokemon to switch in.
